text: @Mike_Pence Caring about Human life = Doing what every other nation in the world is doing to minimize the impact of COVID-19 on their citizens. We are well on the way to 200k+ dead, & you guys are doing nothing, & saying “human life is sacred” is BS. Your actions do NOT align with your words
